block.p: Wendy Diane Toll, a daughter of Robbi and Bruce Toll of Rydal, Pa., was married there last evening at her parents' house to Douglas Lee Topkis, a son of Zelda and Stuart Topkis, also of Rydal. Rabbi William Kuhn performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Topkis, a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania, and Mr. Topkis, who graduated from Lehigh University, met at Penn, where he received an M.B.A. She received a law degree from Penn last month.

Wendy Diane Toll, a daughter of Robbi and Bruce Toll of Rydal, Pa., was married there last evening at her parents' house to Douglas Lee Topkis, a son of Zelda and Stuart Topkis, also of Rydal. Rabbi William Kuhn performed the ceremony.

Mrs. Topkis, a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania, and Mr. Topkis, who graduated from Lehigh University, met at Penn, where he received an M.B.A. She received a law degree from Penn last month.

The bride, 25, is to become an associate in October at Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver & Jacobson, a law firm in New York. Her father is the vice chairman of Toll Brothers, the home building company, and the chairman of Bet Investments, a real estate investment trust, both in Huntingdon Valley, Pa. Her mother is the president of RST Designs, an interior decorating business in Huntingdon Valley.

The bridegroom, 29, is a vice president in the asset management division of Salomon Smith Barney in New York. His mother is president of the Sigma Supplies Corporation, a medical supply company in Warminster, Pa. His father, a primary-care physician, is a partner in Warminster Medical Associates.
